title: Flores de Bach: Mapa conceptual
author: Médico Interno de Pregrado em Hospital general de zona No
description: Flores de Bach: Mapa conceptual - Transferir como PDF ou ver online gratuitamente
cleaned_text: 1. Universidad Veracruzana Facultad de Medicina Bach flower remedies are dilutions of flower material developed by Edward Bach, an English bacteriologist, pathologist and homeopath, in the 1930s. on petals for emotional and spiritual conditions, depression, anxiety, insomnia and stress. The remedies contain a very small amount of flower material in a 50:50 solution of brandy and water. Because the remedies are extremely diluted they do not have a characteristic scent or taste of the plant. It is claimed that the remedies contain "energetic" or "vibrational" nature of the flower and that this can be transmitted to the user. Fuente: http://www.floresdebach.net Medicina
